Flow.description: ESC-1453: added extra picklist "3rd Party Landowner/Occupier" for Contact record type. ESC-1684: Logic added for new Land Contact creation from Flow screen . Fault path is added. ESC-1708: Updated logic to include street2 and street3.
Flow.label: SPEN Create Land Contact

fields.name: SPEN_MessageContact
fields.fieldText: Where a Land Contact requires a Land Right, you must ensure to link or create a vendor in SAP before creating a Land Contact in ESCOMS.

fields.name: SPEN_FaultMessage
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.SPEN_ErrorHandlingMessage}

fields.name: SPEN_ShowLandContactNotSelectedMsg
fields.fieldText: Land Contact is not selected, please select a Land Contact on previous screen to create a record.

fields.name: SPEN_MessageVendor
fields.fieldText: Where a Land Contact requires a Land Right, you must ensure to link or create a vendor in SAP before creating a Land Contact in ESCOMS.
